bill.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2670) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2024 for military activities of the Department of Defense and for military construction, and for defense activities of the Department of Energy, to prescribe military personnel strengths for such fiscal year, and for other purposes.
bill.description: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2670) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2024 for military activities of the Department of Defense and for military construction, and for defense activities of the Department of Energy, to prescribe military personnel strengths for such fiscal year, and for other purposes.

history.action: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 118-141, by Mr. Cole.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 28.

The resolution provides for consideration of H.R. 2670 under a structured rule with one hour of general debate. The resolution provides that the amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 118-10, modified by the amendment printed in Part A of the Rules Committee report, shall be considered as adopted.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 582.
H.Amdt.215 Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Cole. (consideration: CR H3229; text: CR H3229)

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H. Res. 582, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question on the amendment and the resolution and by voice vote, announced the ayes had prevailed. Mr. McGovern demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings until a time to be announced.
H.Amdt.215 On ordering the previous question on the amendment (A001) and the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 215- 201 (Roll no. 292).
H.Amdt.215 On agreeing to the Cole amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 207 (Roll no. 293).
On agreeing to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 207 (Roll no. 294).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

votes.desc: On Ordering the Previous Question RC# 292
On Agreeing to the Amendment RC# 293
On Agreeing to the Resolution, as Amended RC# 294
